Reviews.Title: Your search ends here!
Reviews.Author: Candide
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with this purchase for several reasons.  1. The shipping was speedy!  2. For what you get, the price just cannot be matched elsewhere!  3.  The products(dummy cameras) were packaged nicely and looked exactly as advertised! This is a perfect setup if you are looking to install a dummy monitoring system.  The cameras look exactly like a similar real set w/DVR that I saw for about $500.00.  The IR style is an added feature as well.  They are very easy to install and pretty stable and sturdy once you fix them to the mounting and angles that you want.  Additionally, the fact that they dont have blinking lights is a great bonus because if you are going to use a set of four, who wants to keep climbling ladders and changing batteries!  Finally, I liked the wires that came with the cameras.  They are sticking out the back so all you have to do is place the other end underneath the mounting kit for added realism!  Basically, These cameras are actually are shells of the "real" product only they have been disabled from operational use.  You will also note that they throw in a bunch of warning stickers as well which cost about $10.00 if purchased on their own!!!

Reviews.Title: Coulda fooled me!
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Moore "Mac Insomniac"
Reviews.Content: These cameras really look like the real thing. Comes complete with 4 stickers and a sign in English and Spanish. Has no blinking light, but the newer cameras don't have those anyway, and these look new. Perps are not usually very good at telling these from the real thing, and the theory is that they will see them and go on to the next house (A pro could tell, and could get in no matter what you do). The cameras install easily with 3 provided, plated screws and plastic plaster sleeves if used indoors in sheet rock. Camera can be set at any angle. They look and feel real. I'm sure that there are other, more expensive ones that may be better, but these should do their intended purpose: Potential thief sees sign, looks up, sees a camera, leaves.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Christopher Wilkerson
Reviews.Content: I think these are a pretty effective deterrent.  They are easy to install and adjust.  Though I kinda wish they didn't say "video camera" on the side.

Reviews.Title: Eh
Reviews.Author: Patrick M. Hislar
Reviews.Content: Didn't come with the stickers - very cheap, but I put them up without the LED/battery. Didn't want to have these things flashing all the time and didn't want to have to take them down to change the battery. All in all not bad for a fake camera, but I think you could get a better price then I did for the four. These cameras do look fairly real even close up - one thing I didn't like was the appature positioning and the cheap screw that broke off when I tried to move the camera "lens" to a certain position. I'm hope-ing a would-be-theif will move on to the next house due to the deterrent these cameras may provide.

Reviews.Title: not as described & obviously fake
Reviews.Author: NJS29
Reviews.Content: I purchased this from an Amazon warehouse seller named Qiang Zhao for $29.99.  I had seen other fake cameras for ~$10/each so I thought 4 fake cameras for $30 was a good deal.I received the items quickly enough and they were packaged well in individual boxes; no damage.Issues:1. the item description says "VideoSecu 4 Dummy Imitation Security Camera with Flashing Light LED Cost-effective Security CCTV Simulated Dome Camera DMY03D4 WE5".  These fake cameras sold by  Qiang Zhao are NOT by VideoSecu (a legitimate video security/surveillance company).  in fact, if you look up the model # DMY03D4 on [...], no results are found2. the cameras i received had two plastic screws holes on the sides that makes them look OBVIOUSLY fake.  from the street, a anyone (including a thief) might think these are real, but come any closer it is obvious that they are fake.luckily the order was fulfilled by amazon so I was able to return it without issue. BUYER BEWARE!!!NOTE: real cameras do NOT have blinking red lights, so if you do buy these, please do not put the batteries in.  you may as well put a neon sign on your house saying "I am too cheap for real security."  to a thief this means that the ADT security/alarm monitoring sign you have in front of your house is probably fake too.

Reviews.Title: Best dummy camera
Reviews.Author: Best Product
Reviews.Content: Product has been working very good so far. It been doing its job the red flashing light makes it look liek its really on but now I have real cameras.

Reviews.Title: Get what I pay for
Reviews.Author: jay
Reviews.Content: The most important thing is when handling these,be very gentle and do not let them fall...if this happens u will see them shatter...if u are careful and don't handle them much,and hang them,they look decent as a supposedly surveillance camera....

Reviews.Title: Very cheaply constructed, obviously not a real camera.
Reviews.Author: Gene in AZ
Reviews.Content: These do not look real at all. To change the battery you have to take it down and realign with the mounting screws after battery change.

Reviews.Title: Deters crime like the real ones
Reviews.Author: NorCal Explorer "Michael"
Reviews.Content: When we installed these on the walls during off hours and put up the signs telling the little thieves that they are on camera the thefts stopped immediately.  These look like the real ones as long as you do not get right up on them.  One suggestion to those who might buy these, do not put the battery in for the light, this is a dead give away that it is fake.Simple to install and produces enough paranoia in the potential thieves that they skill our store go some where else.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: We installed these right after we had a break in and they have worked well so far.  No break ins since installation and they are holding up well against the Costa Rican climate.

Reviews.Title: Looks somewhat good but "camera" adjustment is non-existent
Reviews.Author: P. NGUYEN "The truth is temporarily painful"
Reviews.Content: I bought this fake dummy camera set based on the 5 star reviews I read here.  Well, I was kinda disappointed when I actually had them in hand.  First and foremost these are really, really cheap looking.  Sure, they're plastic and everything but when you remove the cover to install the batteries you'll know what I mean.  Poor molding manufacturing shows through out.  The camera or rather fake LED bulb resembling the lens can't be tilted up or down without hitting the battery compartment.  Make sure you know which direction and angle you want the fake lens to aim at and mark the holes (the mounting holes are not indicative of any direction).Last but not least is the battery placement itself. To replace the batteries you have to remove the base instead of just the cover.  This is cumbersome and could have been reversed so that when you remove the cover, you have access to the battery box without having to also the base also.  Granted if you installed it correctly, you can twist the base off of the two retaining screws but I like mine to be secure so that means having to loosen the screws.  So yes, to replace the batteries you will have to loosen the mounting screws holding the base in after you have removed the cover.  I am not sure yet how long the 2 AA batteries will last but I am hoping at least 6 months.  The stickers included are just OK and seem generic and quite cheesy.  Personally, I would rather not use the stickers because it might equate to cheesy = fake camera.

Reviews.Title: Very convincing and easy to put up
Reviews.Author: Casey Finigan
Reviews.Content: Easy to install. Very convincing. Seem to be stable we put them outside and I love that it comes with monitoring stickers.

Reviews.Title: Nice looking product
Reviews.Author: Chancer L. Reese
Reviews.Content: Dummy security cameras arrived as described. Not installed yet, but we think it will do the job that we want.

Reviews.Title: A must in these desperate times
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: If you just dont have the money for a full blow system this is the next best thing, these dummy camere's have come along way from the ones of the past and that is that you truly can't tell the difference,they are motion activated and when someone walks by the have a bult in cue light by the lens that starts blinking,and being dark and glossy you just can't tell ,now as I tell everyone the key is TELL NO ONE THEY ARE NOT REAL or you just wasted your money even your kids will be telling there friends ,all don't worry there not real ,and the next thing you know it's one of those fiens who are now breaking into your home, it's just common sennse and the babysitter as well will be on her toes now, so do you and your family a favor and at least have some form of deterrance in the dangerous times the national crime percentage is 18% the highest it's been for over 20 years which only tells you people are desperate when they had a deccent job and now unemployed and can't even feed there family's ,so if you can't afford the real thing this is the real thing when it comes to those who will be seeing them !

Reviews.Title: very good choice
Reviews.Author: coco loco
Reviews.Content: THIS WORKS PERFECT THANK YOU SO MUCH IM VERY  PLEASE WITH THEM LOVE IT THEY LOOK SO REAL IS NOT A JOKE FOR THE PRICE I PAY IM VERY HAPPY :)

Reviews.Title: Okay product, fast shipping.
Reviews.Author: Spark
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed the fast shipping, the product is okay.  Not what i thought it was going to be, but they do the job set out to do.  The red light could blink just a tad less brighter.  Also it could use some tighter parts on the camera itself.  All in all it is a great product for the price, and they are good for deterrent cameras.  I will use this company in the future!!

Reviews.Title: Hard to review
Reviews.Author: J. Q. Touma
Reviews.Content: This item is very hard to review because you know you are buying a very cheap and fake product.The domes are not real but they have to pretend they are. The see throug plastic dome is carved on the side a big black plastic circle(quarter size) that is where it gets a hold on to the basis. If you have it on a close look you can see that and you know its a fake dome.The red led light that it has inside makes it look even more fake. It bliks like it is running out of battery. It blinks just too fast.I placed them at high places so people dont know witch ones are fakes and witch ones are real. I did not put any batteries on them because the red led light does not help at all.As I placed them for security I have to say they look very realistic. Up high (5 meters or more)and the led light OFF.The produt is OK. Dont expect for the price a perfect security dome. I give a 4 star because i did know what i was buying

Reviews.Title: Fake ("dummy") video cameras
Reviews.Author: Richard C. Robinson "rickradio"
Reviews.Content: This set of four fake video security cameras is reasonably priced.  It doesn't have a blinking light or motion detector, but it's no big deal.  Most of the modern ones don't have that feature anyway.  These are essentially video cameras without the guts, so it's just a shell.  But it works.  The set also comes with security warning stickers.  It's really a good buy.  It serves my needs well and I would purchase them again.

Reviews.Title: They look real!!
Reviews.Author: Heather Stovall
Reviews.Content: Very cheap, but look like the real thing. with the cord at the bottom, and huge stickers. It was worked wonders at my house!!!

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: These dummy cameras are everything they claim to be. They look real and are easy to install. From previous reviews I didn't bother to install with batteries so I therefore cannot comment on battery life.

Reviews.Title: Very convincing
Reviews.Author: TrisherOC
Reviews.Content: We put these up to supplement our real, working cameras.  No one -- I mean no one -- can tell the difference.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Video Services Of Va
Reviews.Content: This product is exactly as described. It also comes with a nice 8.5x11 poster to warn people that they are under video surveillance as well as the 4 stickers. Good purchase. I'll buy more. Put up some security lights and punks and thieves will go on to the next house.Word has already spread through my neighborhood that I have cameras. They want to know how the technology works. I just tell them I receive emails (with pictures) on my cell phone every time the cameras are activated. People just love to gossip. Then there you go.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Joseph Donnelly
Reviews.Content: This works great.  My kids think they are totally real and think I have gone over board big time.  My place seems to be a lot safer.

Reviews.Title: ... so you can turn on and off as you like..
Reviews.Author: Chuck R.
Reviews.Content: they need an on/off switch on the outside of camera so you can turn on and off as you like.....

Reviews.Title: security camera
Reviews.Author: Juan Herrera
Reviews.Content: what i like of this cameras is that they look like the real thing and they are dark enough,and with the light flashing make the intruders think twice before they try doing something.will recommened to any one.

Reviews.Title: Horrible and cheap
Reviews.Author: Andrea Sciberras
Reviews.Content: 2 of the 4 cameras were broken. One I had to solder the wires back together. Piece of garbage, spend a little more to get something decent.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste you $$$
Reviews.Author: S.P.
Reviews.Content: These are of horrid quality, do not waste you time and money.Especially if you use the blinking light, the constant changing of the batteries will eventually lead to the unit falling apart.

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: ben russell
Reviews.Content: Product was not exspensive but does not look real and is very cheaply made.I would not purcase this product again.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Steve Coffey
Reviews.Content: These cameras are realistic looking enough, however 2 out of the pack of 4 that I purchased have arrived with the yellow wires pulled out of the soldering board. Not a big deal if you own a soldering gun, but to people out there who dont, or people who have no idea how to even use one this may not be your best option. On the plus side though all of my neighbors now are totally convinced that I have the best security system on the block:)

Reviews.Title: Absolute crap
Reviews.Author: Allen456
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting much but these didn't even live up to that.  Two of them, the lights didn't come on.  You have to take them down to change the batteries and what's the point of a light that is always on?  You never knoow when the batteries will go flat.  Even for $25 I would have expected a cheapo solar switch.  The soft plastic doesn't want to stay on the screws either and the way it's designed makes it difficult to install.

Reviews.Title: It does the job
Reviews.Author: C. BINZ "buzca"
Reviews.Content: I gave this only two stars as the quality of the product lets lots to be desired. It is an ok product and will do the  job but was not at all impressed on the finished product

Reviews.Title: NOT THRILLED!!!
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: No Instructions, which led me to attempt to unscrew the two screws that held the globe, which damaged the unit \. THANKS!A one cent paper template for the screw hole locations would be nice.It just does not look like the real thing, but maybe it will stop a real, real  stupid thief.

Reviews.Author: Eegii
Reviews.Content: May do the trick, but it could have had a better and easier way for the batteries to be put in and out (on the side or something), because the wires for the blinker are so flimsy and almost a hair width thick...

Reviews.Title: Mediocre product
Reviews.Author: LaMar L Wyse
Reviews.Content: These look ok.  No signs included as shown.  Of the four cameras, the motion detector worked in only two, and the motion had to be very close to the camera.  Probably worth what I paid, but a mediocre product overall.

Reviews.Title: It's obvious that it's a fake
Reviews.Author: JohnnyHI "JohnnyHI"
Reviews.Content: Save your money...  It's obvious that the "camera" is fake when viewing it up close.  The "camera" is actually an inoperable LED bulb.

Reviews.Title: Better then described
Reviews.Author: Jon W.
Reviews.Content: Very Awesome!!! All the employees think they are real and they look AMAZING!!! It has honestly stopped the theft in the work place!!

Reviews.Title: Flimsy!
Reviews.Author: Edgar Farsakyan
Reviews.Content: Very flimsy, It fell and broke immediately, they didn't even provide any screws to attach to wall. I wasn't asking for a state of the art techy

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: honk
Reviews.Content: The decals seem a little fake...at least one of the lights didn't work (which is okay since I don't use them anyways). I had to take one apart because of a large white stain on the inside of the clear part of the dome. One of the little plastic "camera" Adjusters was missing (replaced it with a blackened piece of wooden dowel).They look "real" to me, when installed.Over all...happy enough with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Looks real but made cheap
Reviews.Author: Stan V.W.
Reviews.Content: One of the plastic screws that holds the fake camera in place fell out of each of the five that I purchased.But they do look real.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment!
Reviews.Author: philadelphian
Reviews.Content: Upon reading other reviews, I was excited to receive this in the mail, but when i did, words cannot describe how disappointed I am. It was cheap, and consume so much battery life. Please save yourself do not buy this!

Reviews.Title: nice cams, good price
Reviews.Author: ZaT
Reviews.Content: these are nice cams for the price.they look really good and look legit once you have it mounted. i install like 2 in my garage because i have many contractors coming to my house daily and working there. i figure a fake cam will help fooling them that its a real cam

Reviews.Title: Looks pretty real
Reviews.Author: leendawoman
Reviews.Content: Bought these after a few break ins in our neighborhood. they look pretty good. I use them in conjunction with our alarm system. So far so good.

Reviews.Title: question
Reviews.Author: MsMe
Reviews.Content: Has anyone used this outside?I would have one under a patio/porch and others in full direct sunlight as well as any other weather. Fortunately where I live it does not rain a lot, I am mostly concerned about the wind and birds, bugs and squirrels.I would greatly appreciate it if any one could help me out in describing how well yours held up outdoors.

Reviews.Title: Serves the purpose
Reviews.Author: FREDERICK
Reviews.Content: Effectively packaged.  Install took some effort lining up the mounting holes and placing the cameras.  Angle adjusters on side of unit could be more securely attached.  Other then those issues, these units are just what I needed.

Reviews.Title: Worth the cost... a little large though
Reviews.Author: Crogers
Reviews.Content: VERY cheap product, but you can't tell with it stuck 10-15 feet up on the ceiling! Gets the job done. Only thing that surprised me is how large they were. Not ridiculously big, but bigger than I might have bought for my home. Perfect for a store (or home that doesn't mind BIG interior security cams). Note re lights: I put batteries in one of them, and the light flashed way too frequently for my taste (once a second?). So I'm not using the light. Didn't even try out the other 3. None of them came with screws... gotta get your own. Not a biggie.

Reviews.Title: arrived quickly
Reviews.Author: "Motives" "CL"
Reviews.Content: the products were shipped promptly. the stickers come with the shipment look fake but hope to mixing use the dummies with the real security cameras will do the trick

Reviews.Title: OK for the price
Reviews.Author: JOHN BLANCHARD
Reviews.Content: They are OK for the price. But, one of the units came apart every time I tried to adjust it. Another of the 4 was missing its pivot screw. All and all, I am not sorry I purchased them.

Reviews.Title: Deters would-be thieves
Reviews.Author: RxAlongo
Reviews.Content: Any deterrent is better than none.  Nothing can ever truly stop a criminal, but these may make them think twice.

Reviews.Title: Warning: total garbage
Reviews.Author: Irate customer
Reviews.Content: Don't believe favorable reviews.  The product is totally non-functional, and the seller will not stand behind it.  If you buy it, you are stuck with a plastic dome that does nothing and appears obviously fake.  Amazon should not allow such a disreputable seller to operate through it's interface.

Reviews.Title: Surprised about good reviews!!!!
Reviews.Author: I. muabed "khaled"
Reviews.Content: First of all, the page mixes 2 different type of products, what you will get is the last picture shown as of today Aug 23 2011 !the first 3 pictures are missleading.Second: there are no light nor IR sensors, so it is like a toy ! the description of the product claim you need batteries, well this is not for this product ! but for the other one...this is cheating..if you want a camera that looks like a toy, doesn't blink, doesn't have any IR nor lights then this is for you..

Reviews.Title: A real aggravation to mount, but they look real
Reviews.Author: G. Orwig
Reviews.Content: There is no simple way to mount these. You have to get two screws set into the wall at exactly the right spacing and rotation. Then you fuss a long time to get the camera mounting slots over the screws, and turn slightly. If the screws are not turned in far enough, you remove the camera, tighten screws, and try again. Everything has to line up just right since there is very little adjustment of the internal "camera" and it can end up pointing way off. Once mounted, it does look real!

Reviews.Title: good deterrent
Reviews.Author: Drawdry
Reviews.Content: Got these to keep people off my property. Had too many people knocking on my door, i live in a semi-secluded area, aline, so I get a bit weary of people i dont know.  With the signs, one real camera, 4 fake ones...no one has come to the door uninvited.These are pretty sturdy, one has been in the rain, and it's still going strong.  The blinking red light is really noticeable at night. Good buy, highly recommend. Although, I don't suggest leaving them in the rain like I did. They are not heavy-duty.

Reviews.Title: legit
Reviews.Author: Rayray
Reviews.Content: Looks legit (my friends thought so too) and easy to install. Cant beat the price for the peace of mind it provides. Didnt use the stickers/signs that came with it tho..bought APN instead

Reviews.Title: Looks like the real thing
Reviews.Author: Notadoctor
Reviews.Content: These fake cameras are quite convincing. Nobody has given any indication that they didn't believe them to be real and functional. A very worthwhile expenditure.

Reviews.Title: The VideoSecu 4 Dummy Imitation Security Cameras satisfied my needs and work great.
Reviews.Author: Joe Bullock
Reviews.Content: The cameras look and work great for what I wanted them for, and the quality and price are attractive to boot.

Reviews.Title: they came as advertised
Reviews.Author: carlos d. perez
Reviews.Content: these cameras look great for the price. I can't really find a flaw and its a cheap way to make my home feel safer.

Reviews.Title: Croftmg34
Reviews.Author: Scott Jacks "Tomb Seeker"
Reviews.Content: I painted these same color of the house and can hardly see them. Great value and they look very real.

Reviews.Title: looks very real
Reviews.Author: J85
Reviews.Content: I have already had people ask me what security company I'm using, I had a get together in my house and one of my guest ask me if I really needed all that security in my house!!!. one thing the signs could had been a little better they show a website of a company that sells real cameras, its could had showed a real security company.

ProductInfo.Features:
Dummy Fake dome surveillance camera with flashing light LED
Increase your security at a fraction of the cost of real cameras
Mix dummy & real cameras to increase your security value, Authentic styling - nobody will know the difference
The inexpensive solution for security/theft problems with high professional imitation
Power require 2 AA batteries ( not included)
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Dummy Imitation Security Cameras with Flashing Light LED Cost-effective Surveillance CCTV Simulated Dome Camera WE5
